entry.string: Add A New Site
entry.translation: Edd A Noo Seete

entry.string: Create New Site
entry.translation: Creete-a Noo Seete

entry.string:
Multisites must be configured first before you can Add a site!

Please configure the master site from the menu option Multisites - Master Config.

The Master site can then return here to Add Sites.
entry.translation:
Moolteesites moost be-a cunffeegoored furst beffure-a yuoo cun Edd a seete-a!

Pleese-a cunffeegoore-a zee mester seete-a frum zee menoo oopshun Moolteesites - Mester Cunffeeg.

Zee Mester seete-a cun zeen retoorn here-a tu Edd Seetes. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: Before you continue, please make sure you have ALREADY created your subsite tables. To do this:
entry.translation: Beffure-a yuoo cunteenooe-a, pleese-a meke-a soore-a yuoo hefe-a ELREEDY creeted yuoor soobseete-a tebles.Tu du thees:

entry.string: Protect your master config.system.php file located in the /var directory (copy it out somewhere safe).
entry.translation: Prutect yuoor mester cunffeeg.system.php feele-a luceted in zee /var durectury (cupy it oooot sumoohere-a seffe-a).

entry.string: Run Xaraya Install to create your subsite tables.
entry.translation: Roon Xereya Instell tu creete-a yuoor soobseete-a tebles.

entry.string: Put your master config.system.php file back in the /var directory.
entry.translation: Poot yuoor mester cunffeeg.system.php feele-a beck in zee /var durectury. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Then return here to finalize creation of the subsite.
entry.translation: Zeen retoorn here-a tu feenelize-a creeshun ooff zee soobseete-a.

entry.string: Site Parameters
entry.translation: Seete-a Peremeters

entry.string: Site Domain Name:
entry.translation: Seete-a Dumeeen Neme-a:

entry.string: Domain or subdomain eg hosting.mydomain.com
entry.translation: Dumeeen oor soobdumeeen eg husteeng.mydumeeen. Bork bork bork!cum

entry.string: Site Table Prefix:
entry.translation: Seete-a Teble-a Preffeex:

entry.string: Prefix of tables for new site. You must enter a prefix here.
entry.translation: Preffeex ooff tebles fur noo seete-a. Yuoo moost inter a preffeex here-a.

entry.string: Site Database:
entry.translation: Seete-a Detebese-a:

entry.string: Defaults to the same database as the Master System site
entry.translation: Deffoolts tu zee seme-a detebese-a es zee Mester System seete

entry.string: Shared tables prefix (NOT FUNCTIONAL):
entry.translation: Shered tebles preffeex (NOT FOoNCTIONEL):

entry.string: LEAVE EMPTY unless you want to share System tables. To share, enter the System Table prefix.
entry.translation: LEEFE IMPTY unless yuoo vunt tu shere-a System tebles. Tu shere-a, inter zee System Teble-a preffeex.

entry.string: Site Status:
entry.translation: Seete-a Stetoos:

entry.string: Pending is the default state.
entry.translation: Pendeeng is zee deffoolt stete-a.

entry.string: Create Database
entry.translation: Creete-a Detebese

entry.string: You must have the correct priviledges to create a DATABASE. Create it manually first if you have problems.
entry.translation: Yuoo moost hefe-a zee currect preefiledges tu creete-a a DETEBESE. Creete-a it munooelly furst iff yuoo hefe-a prublems. Um gesh dee bork, bork!
